item.title: An Image of Africa: Racism in Conrad's Heart of Darkness by Chinua Achebe
item.description: In The Fall of 1974 I was walking one day from the English Depart- ment at the University of Massachusetts to a parking lot. It was a fine autumn morning such as encouraged friendliness to passing strangers. Brisk youngsters were hurrying in all directions, many of them obviously freshmen in their first flush of enthusiasm.An older man going the same way as I turned and remarked to me how very young they came these days.
